content: Hello, I can see that the archive is full for an email account (we get an error message saying so when we try to send or receive new messages), but when I try to delete messages from my archive (to free up space), I see that my settings were set to never delete email messages. I cannot sign in as the administrator to change the setting so my messages will start getting deleted incrementally, because I cannot sign in as I forgot/lost my password.....any help on how to reset my password and change my email settings would be greatly appreciated, thanks.

title: Thunderbird install update
content:
Though the previous version of Thunderbird worked fine on this machine i have been obliged to install a new version : 128.1Oesr.exe All that happens now in that the instalation goes on repreating only to stop when at times reaching a page stating that to open my existing Thunderbird account i need to complete the form asking for : my name, email, password

I check my Mozilla account and found i have a User name and a Display name. Which do i use to complete the form to open my existing Thunderbird account. Where would i find a password for my Thunderbird account? Nothing appears for Mozilla in my list off saved passwords and tbh i didn't know there was a password for the Thunderbird account.

I really need help quickly because having been obliged to instal the update i am now without my email account. thank you
creator: stevewood

title: Thunderbird V115.5.0 (on Debian Linux) - Can't Find the "Font Toolbar" in email "Write" window ... Where is it?
content:
Thunderbird V115.5.0 (on Debian Linux) - Can't Find the "Font Toolbar" in email "Write" window ... Where is it?

I've been using Thunderbird as my email client for decades. After a recent upgrade to software on my Debian Linux PC, I cannot find nor enable the "Font Toolbar" that was once available within the Write Window. I'd like to continue to employ Thunderbird as my email client, but this feature/capability is a necessity.

The "Font Toolbar" enables one to modify the size, color, and spacing(s) of characters, letters, words, and/or paragraphs, and one may also adjust the super- or sub-script, underlining, over-lining, etc., of the same.

I've just spent several hours attempting to enable this, searching and trying lots of bad ideas on the local Thunderbird GUI's settings. Still.... NO TOOLBAR! This is very disturbing for me. Given the plethora of search results returned during searches, this has been recurring for a good long time. There are lots of folks with this or very similar problems.

I'd like to continue using and enjoying what I have thought was a very good contribution to the globe for use on all sorts of operating systems. For decades, I've solely used Linux. I've liked Mozilla software from the get-go, and this has happened just once before several years ago. Luckily, there was a way to enable it in the "about:config" settings. Today, I couldn't even find a way to enter those settings in this newest version of Thunderbird - V115.5.0.

If the toolbar is still a feature, how do I enable it?
creator: cpkern

title: Signature not removed on reply to HTML emails?
content:
I use a signature below my emails, which is automatically prepended by a signature separator (the "-- " above the signature). When I write text e-mails replies to my emails are with my signature removed, but when I recently switched to HTML emails, the signature is quoted back to me in replies.

This looks like a plain bug to me. Can anyone confirm this behaviour? I use TB 128.1.0esr (64-bit).

Any idea how to avoid/fix this?

title: Cannot unsubscribe specific folder
content:
我在配置QQ邮箱时候，有一个文件夹没有让我可以勾选是否订阅的按钮，只能保持订阅。显示的名字是"其他文件夹"。 When I configure my QQ mailbox, there is a folder that doesn't allow me to check the button to subscribe or not, but only to stay subscribed. The name displayed is "Other Folders".

我通过qq邮箱官方网页版登录的时候没有找到这个文件夹。显示订阅地址是imap://[MYACCOUNT]%40qq.com@imap.qq.com/%26UXZO1mWHTvZZOQ-，推测%26UXZO1mWHTvZZOQ-是文件夹在服务器中的名字。 I can't find this folder when I log in through the official web version of qq mail. It shows the subscription address as imap://[MYACCOUNT]%40qq.com@imap.qq.com/%26UXZO1mWHTvZZOQ-, presumably %26UXZO1mWHTvZZZOQ- is the name of the folder in the server.

我不清楚问题出在thunderbird的客户端还是qq邮箱的服务器上。我希望能够取消这个文件夹的订阅。 I'm not sure if the problem is with the thunderbird client or the qq mail server. I would like to be able to unsubscribe from this folder.
